abstract.text: Configuration of the camera behavior.
When enabled the hardware volume up/down buttons can be used to capture an image if manual snapping is enabled.
For iOS version 17.2 or later is required. On iPhones with camera control (iPhone 16 series) this also enables
zooming and capturing with the camera control.
Default is true
The minimum size of the document in relation to the screen preview to be accepted. The value must be between 0.0
and 1.0.
Default is 0.75
Version: 6.2.0
Determines which camera module to use on start-up.
Default is BACK
The minimum brightness value to accept a detected document.
Default is 50
After a page has been snapped, the delay in milliseconds before auto snapping resumes for the next page.
Default is 200
Returns a JSON string representation format.
Controls the auto snapping speed. The sensitivity must be between 0.0 and 1.0. A value of 1.0 triggers auto
snapping immediately, while a value of 0.0 delays the auto snapping by 3 seconds. The default value is 0.66 (1
second).
Default is 0.66
Determines whether locking the focus at the minimum possible distance is enabled or not (device-specific).
Default is false
The default zoom factor on start-up.
Default is 1.0
Determines whether pinch-to-zoom is enabled or not.
Default is true
Determines whether a landscape document will be detected when the camera is in portrait mode (and vice versa) or
not. This parameter will be ignored if required aspect ratios have been explicitly defined.
Default is true
Determines the prioritization of still image quality and capturing speed.
Default is BALANCED
Configuration of the camera behavior.
Abstract class for all the configurations.
Determines if auto snapping is enabled or not.
Default is true
The required aspect ratios for the document to be accepted.
Determines which camera preview mode to use.
Default is FILL_IN
The minimum pitch/skew angle of the document to be accepted. The value must be between 0.0 and 1.0.
Default is 0.75
Determines whether the flashlight is enabled or not on start-up.
Default is false
Determines whether the document should be cropped automatically after a manual snap or not.
Default is true
